hero_title: You start the journey, we provide the excellence.
hero_subtitle: The best part of your journey starts with us.
featured_subtitle: Specially selected experiences — our seasonal and best-selling tours.
about_p1: Our goal is to fully meet the needs of our customers and make their travel experiences perfect.
about_p2: We specialize in individual and small group tours in Azerbaijan.
destinations_title: Where do you want to go?
footer_desc: Traveling with Clasna Travel is both comfortable and reliable.
about_text: We are a boutique travel operator in Azerbaijan creating meaningful travel experiences.
mission_subtitle: Our main goal is to provide high-quality tourism and transportation services to our customers.
mission_customer_text: By establishing close contact with our customers, we offer individual solutions tailored to their needs.
mission_team_text: We aim to provide excellent service with a professional and experienced team in the field.
mission_quality_text: We are committed to applying the highest quality standards in all our services.
mission_innovation_text: We provide more effective services to our customers with constantly updated technology and innovative solutions.
mission_trust_text: By ensuring transparency in all our processes, we build long-term trust with our customers.
mission_responsibility_text: In our activities, we adhere to the principles of environmental protection and social responsibility.
vision_text: Our company aims to become a leading organization in the field of tourism and transportation in the future.
cta_text: Do not hesitate to contact us with your questions or suggestions.
car_intro_title: The Most Comfortable Way to Hit the Road
car_intro_desc: We offer short and long-term car rental services with a wide fleet of vehicles.
transport_subtitle: Professional solutions for your comfortable and safe journey.
transport_card_personal_desc: We provide comfortable and reliable transportation with high-quality cars for various needs.
transport_card_luxury_desc: Make your special moments even more memorable with luxury sedans and SUVs.
transport_card_airport_desc: We ensure your comfortable and timely arrival from the airport to your hotel or vice versa.
transport_card_transfers_desc: Comfortable transfer services from any point to your destination.
explore_desc: We offer various tour packages for individual and group trips.
service_grid_tour_packages_desc: City tours, cultural and historical tours, adventure and nature tours.
service_grid_city_tours_desc: Cultural and historical places of Baku, Gabala, Sheki and other cities.
service_grid_culture_desc: Discover the rich history and culture of Azerbaijan.
service_grid_adventure_desc: Hiking, camping and other outdoor activities in mountainous regions.
service_grid_hotel_desc: We offer online booking for hotels in different parts of the world.
service_grid_luxury_hotels_desc: Discover the rich history and culture of Azerbaijan.
service_grid_visa_desc: We facilitate visa procedures for various countries.
